module.p:
bodach ann am monadh an old man on a moor –
Tha am bodach anns a’ mhonadh leis a’ chù.
The old man is on the moor with the dog. td. 21 [229]

caora ann am monadh a sheep on a moor –
Bha mi anns a’ mhonadh an dé. Chunnaic mi caoraich agus crodh anns a’ mhonadh.
I was on the moor yesterday. I saw sheep and cattle on the moor. td. 21

crodh ann am monadh cattle on a moor –
Bha mi anns a’ mhonadh an dé. Chunnaic mi caoraich agus crodh anns a’ mhonadh.
I was on the moor yesterday. I saw sheep and cattle on the moor. td. 21

fang ann am monadh a fank on a moor –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank. td. 76

cìobair ann am monadh a shepherd on a moor –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank. td. 76

nead ann am monadh a nest on a moor –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. [...] Thàinig iad gu allt agus thòisich Seumas air iasgach. Cha do ghlac Seumas breac ach fhuair Màiri nead anns an fhraoch.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. [...] They came to a burn and James started fishing. James didn’t catch a trout but Mary found a nest in the heather. td. 76

allt ann am monadh a burn on a moor –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. [...] Thàinig iad gu allt agus thòisich Seumas air iasgach. Cha do ghlac Seumas breac ach fhuair Màiri nead anns an fhraoch.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. [...] They came to a burn and James started fishing. James didn’t catch a trout but Mary found a nest in the heather. td. 76

fraoch ann am monadh heather on a moor –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. [...] Thàinig iad gu allt agus thòisich Seumas air iasgach. Cha do ghlac Seumas breac ach fhuair Màiri nead anns an fhraoch.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. [...] They came to a burn and James started fishing. James didn’t catch a trout but Mary found a nest in the heather. td. 76

ruig ... monadh ... reaches a moor –
Nuair a ràinig Màiri agus Seumas am monadh, bha na cìobairean aig an fhang.
When Mary and James reached the moor, the shepherds were at the fank. td. 76

li.gd: Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé.
li.tr: Mary and James were on the moor yesterday.
